Field Name: Fiscal Year Deviation
Tooltip: Does the fiscal year deviate from the calendar year?

Field Name: Fiscal Year End
Tooltip: The date at which the fiscal year ends.

Field Name: Referenced Reports
Tooltip: Please upload all relevant reports for this dataset in the PDF format.

Field Name: Are all Group Entities covered?
Tooltip: Are all Group legal entities covered in the reports?

Field Name: Number of Employees
Tooltip: Total Number of Employees (including temporary workers with assignment duration longer than 6 months)

Field Name: Is NFRD mandatory?
Tooltip: Is the NFRD mandatory for your company?

Field Name: Assurance
Tooltip: Level of Assurance of the EU Taxonomy Disclosure (Reasonable Assurance, Limited Assurance, None)

Sub-Category: Assets for Calculation of Green Asset Ratio
Field Name: Total (gross) Carrying Amount
Tooltip: Total overall covered assets which are included in the numerator. Do not include assets which not covered for GAR calculation.

Sub-Category: Assets for Calculation of Green Asset Ratio
Field Name: Total Amount of Assets towards Taxonomy-relevant Sectors (Taxonomy-eligible)
Tooltip: Total amount of assets which are Taxonomy-eligible for any of the six environmental objectives (Climate Change Mitigation, Climate Change Adaptation, Water and Marine Resources, Circular Economy, Pollution Prevention and Control, Biodiversity and Ecosystems)

Sub-Category: Assets for Calculation of Green Asset Ratio
Field Name: Total Amount of Assets which are Environmentally Sustainable (Taxonomy-aligned)
Tooltip: Total amount of assets which are Taxonomy-aligned for any of the six environmental objectives (Climate Change Mitigation, Climate Change Adaptation, Water and Marine Resources, Circular Economy, Pollution Prevention and Control, Biodiversity and Ecosystems)

Sub-Category: Assets for Calculation of Green Asset Ratio
Field Name: Total Amount of Environmentally Sustainable Assets which are Use of Proceeds
Tooltip: Total amount of Taxonomy-aligned assets which are Use of Proceeds for any of the six environmental objectives (Climate Change Mitigation, Climate Change Adaptation, Water and Marine Resources, Circular Economy, Pollution Prevention and Control, Biodiversity and Ecosystems)

Sub-Category: Assets for Calculation of Green Asset Ratio
Field Name: Total Amount of Environmentally Sustainable Assets which are Transitional
Tooltip: Total amount of Taxonomy-aligned assets which are Transitional for any of the six environmental objectives (Climate Change Mitigation, Climate Change Adaptation, Water and Marine Resources, Circular Economy, Pollution Prevention and Control, Biodiversity and Ecosystems)

Sub-Category: Assets for Calculation of Green Asset Ratio
Field Name: Total Amount of Environmentally Sustainable Assets which are Enabling
Tooltip: Total amount of Taxonomy-aligned assets which are Enabling for any of the six environmental objectives (Climate Change Mitigation, Climate Change Adaptation, Water and Marine Resources, Circular Economy, Pollution Prevention and Control, Biodiversity and Ecosystems)

Field Name: Substantial Contribution to Climate Change Mitigation in Percent - Aligned
Tooltip:
Taxonomy-aligned Share substantially contributing to Climate Change Mitigation.
The weighted average value of all the investments that are directed at funding, or are associated with Taxonomy-aligned economic activities relative to the value of total assets covered by the KPI, with the following weights for investments in undertakings: Turnover-based (%).

Field Name: Substantial Contribution to Climate Change Mitigation in Percent - Of which Enabling
Tooltip:
Taxonomy-aligned and Enabling substantially contributing to Climate Change Mitigation.
The weighted average value of all the investments that are directed at funding, or are associated with taxonomy-aligned economic activities relative to the value of total assets covered by the KPI, with the following weights for investments in undertakings: Turnover-based (%).

Field Name: Taxonomy-eligible Non-life Insurance Economic Activities
Tooltip:
The Percentage of Taxonomy-eligible Non-Life Insurance Economic Activities.
Insurance and reinsurance undertakings other than life insurance undertakings shall calculate the KPI related to underwriting activities and present the ‘gross premiums written’ non-life insurance revenue or, as applicable, reinsurance revenue corresponding to Taxonomy-aligned insurance or reinsurance activities

Field Name: Total assets invested / revenue from investment and services
Tooltip:
Investment firms dealing on own account: total assets invested under investment firms' activities dealing on own account (as per Section A of Annex I to Directive 2014/65/EU)
Investment firms not dealing on own account: revenue (i.e. fees, commissions and other monetary benefits) from investment and services and activities other than on own account (as per Section A of Annex I to Directive 2014/65/EU)

Field Name: Substantial Contribution to Climate Change Mitigation in Percent - Eligible
Tooltip:
Share substantially contributing to Climate Change Mitigation
- Investment firms dealing on own account: total assets invested under investment firms' activities dealing on own account (as per Section A of Annex I to Directive 2014/65/EU) of which assets covered by the Taxonomy (Taxonomy-eligible)
- Investment firms not dealing on own account: revenue (i.e. fees, commissions and other monetary benefits) from investment and services and activities other than on own account (as per Section A of Annex I to Directive 2014/65/EU) of which assets covered by the Taxonomy (Taxonomy-eligible)

Field Name: Substantial Contribution to Climate Change Mitigation in Percent - Aligned
Tooltip:
Share substantially contributing to Climate Change Mitigation
- Investment firms dealing on own account: total assets invested under investment firms' activities dealing on own account (as per Section A of Annex I to Directive 2014/65/EU) of which linked to activities aligned with the EU Taxonomy (Taxonomy-aligned)
- Investment firms not dealing on own account: revenue (i.e. fees, commissions and other monetary benefits) from investment and services and activities other than on own account (as per Section A of Annex I to Directive 2014/65/EU) of which from services and activities linked to activities aligned with the EU Taxonomy (Taxonomy-aligned)

Field Name: Substantial Contribution to Climate Change Mitigation in Percent - Of which Enabling
Tooltip:
Share substantially contributing to Climate Change Mitigation
